thread.section_title: Sports - Nebraska City News-Press - Nebraska City, NE
thread.title: Knights blast McCool, remain unbeaten

author: Kirt Manion kmanion@ncnewspress.com
title: Knights blast McCool, remain unbeaten
text: Knights blast McCool, remain unbeaten Comment kmanion@ncnewspress.com Posted Oct. 2, 2015 at 10:42 PM The Lourdes football team scored 62 points in the first half and cruised to its fifth win of the season in a 70-14 triumph at McCool Junction on Friday night. Kyle Francois rushed for 86 yards, scored three touchdowns, had an interception return, a fumble recovery and 12 tackles. Dillon Paap had 11 tackles. The Knights, 5-0, will play next week at Mead.
